messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Re: Unschooling equals no spanking? (was: Help! I...
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/22/03 5:40:12 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... That is exactly how it was for us.  Thanks for bringing that point out.  It doesn t always
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/22/03 5:40:12 PM Eastern Standard Time,
SandraDodd@... writes:

> Quite a few families started off respecting their children and being
> peaceful
> and mindful with them, and then unschooling came along for them.

That is exactly how it was for us. Thanks for bringing that point out. It
doesn't always start out with unschooling and then it works it way into other
areas of your life. For us it started out with respectful (attachment)
parenting and worked into unschooling as they became "school" age.
Pam G


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
